General.Name: Anhui Wanyi Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: AnHui Wanyi Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies analytical instruments. It provides leak detection instruments, environmental monitoring instruments, and laboratory analytical instruments for chromatography, spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, and various industrial applications, such as environment monitoring, leak detection, industrial intelligence, industrial process, medical devices, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hefei, China.

3.Name: Ming  Xu
3.Title: Chief Hardware Expert & Core Technical Staff
